title: Is it a new day for freshwater biodiversity? Reflections on outcomes of the Kunming-Montreal Global Biodiversity Framework
content: by Steven J. Cooke, Ian Harrison, Michele L. Thieme, Sean J. Landsman, Kim Birnie-Gauvin, Rajeev Raghavan, Irena F. Creed, Gary Pritchard, Anthony Ricciardi, Dalal E. L. Hanna
author: Steven J. Cooke
